thread.section_title: banggood 收到的点评内容 | 消费者对于 banggood 的点评意见 | www.banggood.com
thread.title: Johan Deryckere
thread.title_full: banggood 的点评人 Johan Deryckere

author: Johan Deryckere
title: Johan Deryckere
text: A few months ago, when trying out Banggood, I was sceptical I must say. Since that time, I had +70 orders. Some orders went missing in the post, some products arrived damaged. When I filed a complaint with Banggood, I got a reply within a few hours and a satisfying response: refund, resend, etc. All interactions were done in perfect English as well. Furthermore: after investigating the missing items, it turned out it was in the last 5km of the travel that the packages went missing. A well deserved 5 from me.
